detectors.description:
StandardToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefuToken.sol#179-185) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefuToken.sol#182)
